    public interface MyClient {

    @Request(
            url = "http://localhost:8080/hello/user",
            headers = {
                "Accept-Charset: ${encoding}",
                "Content-Type: text/plain"
            }
    )
    String bindingHeader(@Var("encoding") String encoding);
}
